title: Chocolat Shakaijin Yuri Anthology
description:
A yuri anthology of office ladies.

Volume 1
[spoiler]Cover: Amagakure Gido
Illustration: Kurukuruhime
Story 1 Our Night Together (Kishi Torajirou) (colored)
Story 2 Aiming for the happy end (Kiriyama Haruka)
Story 3 First Love Toilette (Momono Moto)
Story 4 Minimum Romance (Kanarashi) (physical version only)
Story 5 Lily hara! (Kodama Naoko)
Story 6 Welcome home (Nagashiro Rouge)
Story 7 One color hydrangea (Takenoko)
Story 8 Office, senpai, I hate (Ohsawa Yayoi)
Story 9 10 years of love (Kabayama)
Story 10 Insensitive cute person (Takemiya Jin)
Story 11 I hide my little finger on marble (Yodokawa)
Story 12 Passing each other-cherishing the miracle you can meet- (Ohi Pikachi)
Story 13 My cute idol (Nakamura Yukichi)
Story 14 A storm is coming (Usui Shio)
Story 15 Adult et cetera(Tokuwotsumu)[/spoiler]

Volume 2
[spoiler]Cover: Hattori Mitsuru
Illustration: Morishima Akiko
Story 1 Marriage hunting (Morishima Akiko)
Story 2 Scraping (Goumoto)
Story 3 My place is only you (Kashikaze)
Story 4 I don’t know about the spring storm (Kiriyama Haruka)
Story 5 which one,which one? (Yasuda Kousuke)
Story 6 Kata koi cinema (Takemiya Jin)
Story 7 Late Bloomer (Hara Yuriko)
Story 8 Story to you (Shiime)
Story 9 After the rainy night (Kobato Neneko)
Story 10 Love letter (Shigisawa Kaya)[/spoiler]

matches.title: Rouge - An Anthology of Stories Between Women
Chouchou Volume 5: Unemployment Girls Love Anthology
